dict.acceptation: 齿轮；装置，工具；传动装置；
使适应；装上齿轮；用齿轮连接；

sent.orig: The Gear method was adopted to solve the stiff differential equation in the transient code.
sent.trans: 瞬态热工水力分析程序采用了适于求解刚性微分方程的吉尔(Gear)方法进行求解。

sent.orig: Specializing in manufacturing the straight gear, bevel gear, spiral gear, gear shaft, wheel and worm shaft.
sent.trans: 专业生产各种直齿轮，斜齿轮，螺旋伞齿轮、齿轴、蜗轮及蜗杆。

sent.orig: Our main products: reducer, gear motor, bevel gear, worm-gear motor, cycloidal reducer and variator.
sent.trans: 公司主要产品有：齿轮减速机；蜗轮蜗杆减速机；螺旋伞齿轮减速机；摆线针轮减速机及无级变速器。

sent.orig: The manual gear box has five forward gear and one reverse gear.
sent.trans: 手动变速箱有五个前进档和一个倒车档。

sent.orig: Comment on technologies development in gear grinder, CNC gear grinder, CNC gear profile grinder.
sent.trans: 综述CNC磨齿机（主要是CNC成形磨齿机）产品技术发展概况。
